solution_line_template: The students bought ${student_ticket_price}*{num_students}=$<<{student_ticket_price}*{num_students}={student_total}>>{student_total} worth of tickets
The adults bought ${adult_ticket_price}*{num_adults}=$<<{adult_ticket_price}*{num_adults}={adult_total}>>{adult_total} worth of tickets
Together ${student_total} + ${adult_total} = $<<{student_total}+{adult_total}={total_value}>>{total_value} worth of tickets were sold
